be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers

Class WelcomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers.WelcomeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConditionController.Listener, LoginController.Listener, RegisterController.Listener, WelcomeViewController.ViewListener

    public class WelcomeController
extends java.lang.Object
implements WelcomeViewController.ViewListener, LoginController.Listener, RegisterController.Listener, ConditionController.Listener
    This class is the listener of the WelcomeViewController.ViewListener.
    This will manage the interaction on the WelcomeView.fxml view.
